name: Flower Parade
description:
You are a brave superwoman on the way to save the humanity from apocalypse! 

Genre: visual novel + FPS 

Playtime: 30-45 min

How to play:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Mouse to look&shoot

1,2,3 to change between guns
